name: Indian Cooking Madness
description:
Let’s play amazing NEW Indian Cooking Madness game for serve delicious Indian food. It’s amazing food management game for cooking lover.

Show your cooking skills and create your food empire. It’s amazing casual game. In this amazing food for launch and dinner.

In this there are so many Indian variety of delicious recipes like chapati, vegetables, butter milk, rice, salad, ice-cream etc.

How to play?
=========
- It’s amazing food management game. Serve order of customer and collect the coins.
- Achieve your target and completed one by one levels.
- Used power for help to management.

Top Features:
===========
- Amazing and adventure 70+ levels.
- Colourful graphics with ultimate music.
- There are 2 different powers help to serve food.
- Many challenging levels.
- Easy to play.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play this game? Download Now….
